title: Company Registration
description: Submit your company details and requirements
details: Fill out the company registration form with complete details
Provide company profile, job descriptions, and requirements
Submit necessary documents (company brochure, offer letter format)
Our team will verify and approve your registration within 48 hours

title: Pre-Placement Talk
description: Present your company to interested students
details: Schedule a presentation slot with our placement team
Present company overview, culture, and opportunities
Interact with students and answer their queries
Share insights about job roles and career growth

title: Student Shortlisting
details: Receive resumes of eligible students based on your criteria
Review academic records and project portfolios
Shortlist candidates for the selection process
Communicate shortlisted candidates to placement cell

title: Selection Process
details: Written test/online assessment (if required)
Technical interview rounds
HR interview and culture fit assessment
Final selection and result declaration

title: Offer & Onboarding
details: Issue offer letters to selected candidates
Complete documentation and background verification
Provide joining instructions and onboarding details
Coordinate with placement cell for final formalities
